meanings.definition: In a manner that is in agreement or harmony with something else.
meanings.sent1: She nodded accordantly to show she understood.
meanings.sent2: He followed the instructions accordantly, without any deviation.
meanings.sent3: The music played accordantly with the rhythm of the falling rain.
meanings.sent4: The colors of the painting blended accordantly, creating a beautiful masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The team worked accordantly to achieve their common goal.

meanings.definition: In a way that is consistent or in accordance with something else.
meanings.sent1: The results of the experiment were accordantly recorded in the lab report.
meanings.sent2: She spoke accordantly with the guidelines set by the organization.
meanings.sent3: The cat meowed accordantly with the tune of the song playing on the radio.
meanings.sent4: The gears of the clock turned accordantly, marking the passage of time.
meanings.sent5: The leaves rustled accordantly in the gentle breeze.
